parameters.text: "I see you're new here, Let me tell you some fundementals"
"Press Z to interact (you probably already know that)"
"You could chop trees down, or Punch some stone to mine them"
"Now lets get into the second fundemntals!. Which is building"
"You see those tooltip on top of the Unfinished buildings?"
"Thats your progress counter towards building the structure"
"How about now you try to finish the buildings?"
"And also, Socialize!, im not the only human being that is here!"
"They will sure love to helo newcomers."
"Go socialize with other people man, are you an introvert?"
"Or you just hate that guy beside the fence?"
"Sorry, but i think you should talk to him first."
"I dont really know my job, but i stand here all day"
"Waiting for someone to finnaly talk to me."
"Well, you have just discovered a new Area!"
"Don't ask me why its named that, its history at this point."
"In this Area, There Soooo many Stonesssss"
"Fun fact : Stones are tougher to break!!!"
"it took me while to notice that Stone is harder than Wood,, So i would be proud if i educate someone."
"Dont be as dumb as me kiddo!"
"Dont mind me!, im just standing.. like usual...."
"Talk to the guy beside the fence first, you wouldnt get what am i saying"
"Actually, i dont have to ask, you're forced to do it."
"Go talk to the guy beside the fence first, then come straight back here!"
"You're gay, so you're a slave in my eyes."
